title: Big City Villain
description: Seventeen-year-old Coal Black takes being the bad boy to a whole new level. A super level. Known as the cityâ€™s terrifying super villain, Headphones, Coal works hard to keep his bad reputation intact despite being banned from using his powers. But things soon take a drastic turn when a deadly vigilante promises to destroy his whole world and his brother.When his secrets are threatened, how far will Coal go to keep everything from unraveling? And with betrayal around every corner, he just might not make it out alive.Welcome to the world of supers, where everything is not what it seems to be. Grab a copy and join Coal as he makes the impossible, possible.
author: Penelope Ray
